lines.text: You're my friend? Remind me never to talk to you again!
What are you mad about? Can I help it if it didn't take any brains to fix it?
If it took any brains, would I need you?
I don't know.

[to Lou]
Hi, alligator! What's the scam, man?
Listen, you. You stop oogly boogling me. And stay away from Shelli.

[Smiles]
Oh, that Shelli.
[He whistles]
There's a dish. Real cool man. Real cooly drooly. I say, man, she's got IT!
And she's gonna keep IT! You stay away from her.
That's bop, man. Beed a bop bop!
You're gonna get bopped!
Little fat man, your partner's got some information we want. I think maybe you got the information too since you were there when it happened.
What happened?
When the D.A. was knocked off.
I was unconscious when it happened.
If it'll help your memory, we can easily render you unconscious again.
You've got it all wrong, Big Frank. He's just naturally unconscious.

[Smiles]
Thanks, Bud!
I'll say this for you. You've got nerve.
Eh. You'll have to look hard to find anybody more nervous than me.
Popsie, you're my inspiration!
